title: Class 12 student who will give pessat this year, how much marks is safe for cse/ece at both campuses?

comments.body: If I remember correctly, PESSAT marks are never released, only ranks. Maybe one of the current first years will remember the closing ranks for each branch this year (they are also usually put up on the website but I could be mistaken)

As far as I remember i scored around 68 and I got CSE in EC campus
But my rank was nearer to cut off rank. Also I missed 30 questions to Mark. I thought pessat had negative marking tho it doesn't have.
I read somewhere if you get above 100 in pessat your CSE is secured in RR campus
thank you, what year did you write the exam?

Pessat marks are never revealed,  but for cse core this year's cutoff went till 1238 during Pessat 2nd round and close to 1.4k during extended round for Rr campus. And for Ec campus cse cutoff went till 3.2k. I heard this year they might again increase the seats due to opening of Golden jubilee block. So the cutoffs will go even more higher(rank wise).
